Sun, 09 Jun 2024 03:56:52 +0000 The prize was won by seven tickets as no single ticket had the correct Powerball and First Division Lotto numbers needed to win outright.

Two of them were clearly sick and she says "zombie fish" is an appropriate term for how they looked, with sunken faces and eyes.
